multiplayer.disconnect.generic: You have been disconnected from the server.
multiplayer.disconnect.duplicate_nick: The nickname '{0}' is already in use on this server.
multiplayer.disconnect.duplicate_uuid: This account is already connected from another session.
multiplayer.disconnect.version_mismatch:
Client and server versions do not match.
Client: {0} (protocol {1})
Server: {2} (protocol {3})
multiplayer.disconnect.handshake_decode_: Protocol error: failed to decode handshake.
transport.timeout: Connection timed out. Please check your internet connection or the server status.
transport.server_closed: The server has closed the connection.
transport.connection_refused: Connection refused. Is the server running and the address/port correct?
transport.host_not_found: Could not resolve the server address. Please check the hostname or try using an IP address.
transport.network_unreachable: Network unreachable. Please check your connection or firewall.
transport.connection_reset: The connection was reset by the remote host.
transport.protocol_decode: Protocol error while communicating with the server.
